name: Inside Her (bedroom)
description:
By using the keyboard's arrows, Move two mirrored characters to Get the items around the floor. Each monster girl has a Unique Skill like moving through walls, pushing items, etc. Solve the puzzles to increase their desire and, at the end of their challenge, get a hot uncensored sex scene.

Features


  • 5 Hot Monsters Girls;
  • Animated CGs;
  • Unique mechanic compared to most Steam's hentai games;
  • CG Gallery;
  • 35 Levels;
  • 40 Steam Achievements;
  • Possibility to discover the secrets of a girl's room!
